Label: Purpose
Provider: To clarify which organization is holds the resource or acts as the custodian for the metadata record and to help users understand which resources they can access

Label: Entry Guidelines
Provider: This field can be any string value. However, if the value corresponds to the name of an SVG icon in GeoBlacklight, the icon will display next to the title. [See the GeoBlacklight documentation for more details.](https://geoblacklight.org/docs/customization/adding_svg_icons/)

Label: Commentary
Provider: This field was named **Provenance** in the GBL 1.0 Metadata schema.
